00017 // EARS

00023 
00024 
00026 void 
00027 ears::OutputWriter::outputAssocRes( const std::string& task, 
00028                                     const ASSOCRES_T& pqe )
00029 {  
00030   //
00031   // parameters
00032   //
00033   std::string outputFile = lemur::api::ParamGetString( "outputFile" );
00034   int outputFileFormat = lemur::api::ParamGetInt( "outputFileFormat", 0 );
00035   int outputNum = lemur::api::ParamGetInt( "outputNum", 0 );
00036   std::string runID = lemur::api::ParamGetString( "runID", "EARS" );
00037   
00038   if ( outputFile.length() == 0 ) {
00039     LOG( logERROR ) << "Parameter 'outputFile' is not set";
00040     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );    
00041   }
00042   
00043   //
00044   // writing output to file
00045   //
00046   LOG( logINFO ) << "Writing output to '" << outputFile << "'";
00047   fstream outFile ( outputFile.c_str(), ios::out | ios::trunc );
00048   lemur::api::IndexedRealVector res;
00049   
00050   if ( outFile.is_open() ) {
00051     
00052     // Output for entity finding
00053     if ( task == "ef" ) {      
00054       for ( ID_T qID = 0; qID < queries_.queryNum(); qID++ ) { // for each query        
00055         const EXID_T queryID = queries_.queryID( qID );
00056         this->resultsFinding( pqe, qID, res );
00057         
00058         if ( outputNum > 0 ) // limit the number of results
00059           res.resize( outputNum );
00060         
00061         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "Query #" << (qID+1) << " ('" << queryID << "')"
00062           << " top "<< res.size() << " results";
00063         
00064         this->writeRecord( outFile, task, outputFileFormat, queryID, res, runID );        
00065       } // qID
00066     } // ef
00067 
00068     // Output for entity profiling
00069     if ( task == "ep" ) {      
00070       for ( ID_T eID = 0; eID < entities_.entityNum(); eID++ ) { // for each entity
00071         const EXID_T entityID = entities_.entityID( eID );
00072         this->resultsProfiling( pqe, eID, res );
00073         
00074         if ( outputNum > 0 ) // limit the number of results
00075           res.resize( outputNum );
00076         
00077         LOG( logDEBUG2 ) << "Entity #" << (eID+1) << " ('" << entityID 
00078           << "') top "<< res.size() << " results";
00079         
00080         this->writeRecord( outFile, task, outputFileFormat, entityID, res, runID );        
00081       } // entityID
00082     } // ep
00083     
00084     outFile.close();
00085   }
00086   else {
00087     LOG( logERROR ) << "Can't open '" << outputFile << "', check path and permissions!";
00088     exit( EXIT_FAILURE );
00089   }
00090   
00091 }
00092 
00093 
00094 
00096 void 
00097 ears::OutputWriter::resultsFinding( const ASSOCRES_T& pqe, 
00098                                     const ID_T qID,
00099                                     lemur::api::IndexedRealVector& res )
00100 {
00101   res.clear();
00102   for ( ID_T eID = 0; eID < entities_.entityNum(); eID++ ) {
00103     res.PushValue( eID, pqe[eID][qID] );      
00104   }
00105   res.Sort();
00106 }
00107 
00108 
00109 
00111 void 
00112 ears::OutputWriter::resultsProfiling( const ASSOCRES_T& pqe, 
00113                                       const ID_T eID,
00114                                       lemur::api::IndexedRealVector& res )
00115 {
00116   res.clear();
00117   for ( ID_T qID = 0; qID < queries_.queryNum(); qID++ ) {
00118     res.PushValue( qID, pqe[eID][qID] );      
00119   }
00120   res.Sort();
00121 }
00122 
00123 
00124 
00126 void
00127 ears::OutputWriter::writeRecord( fstream& outFile, 
00128                                  const std::string& task,
00129                                  const int& outFileFormat,
00130                                  const std::string& ID,
00131                                  const lemur::api::IndexedRealVector& res,
00132                                  const std::string& runID
00133                                 )
00134 {
00135   for ( int i = 0; i < res.size(); i++ ) {
00136     const double& score = res[i].val;
00137     
00138     EXID_T resID;
00139     if ( task == "ef" )
00140       resID = entities_.entityID( res[i].ind );
00141     if ( task == "ep" )
00142       resID = queries_.queryID( res[i].ind );
00143             
00144     // output format 
00145     switch ( outFileFormat ) {
00146       case 1:
00147         // ID resID score
00148         outFile << ID << " " << resID << " " << score << endl;
00149         break;
00150       default: // 0
00151         // ID Q0 resID rank score runID
00152         outFile << ID << " Q0 " << resID << " " << (i+1) << " " 
00153           << score << " " << runID << endl;              
00154         break;
00155     } // outputFileFormat             
00156   } // i
00157 }
